problems.description: Implement Kruskal's algorithm to generate a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) for the given connected undirected graph.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a connected graph represented by its vertices and adjacency list of weighted edges. Each key in the 'edges' object represents a vertex, and its value is another object where keys are adjacent vertices and values are edge weights e.g. {"A": {"B": 1}, "B": {"A": 1}}.
problems.expected description: An array of arrays, where each inner array represents an edge in the Minimum Spanning Tree (MST), along with its weight e.g. ["A", "B", 1]. Edges are sorted by weight in ascending order.
